boat.full_description: Suffling was built from one of the early Gaffling 4.1 kits, cut by Demon Yacht of Slaughden, as an East Coast OGA community project, with her paint work and covers sponsored by Teamac Paints. The build started in early 2021, and completed during Covid lockdown. She was launched at Walton and Frinton Yacht Club during the Swallow's and Amazons event in 2021 as the first in class completed after the official class name was decided.
boat.name: Suffling
boat.short_description: Suffling was built by the East Coast OGA
